Ịdọ áká ná ntị snow siri ike bụ nkwupụta ihu igwe dị ize ndụ nkè ụlọ ọrụ Weather Forecast Offices nkè National Weather Service (NWS) na United States wepụtara nké na-egosi na nnukwu snow na-ada ma ọ bụ na-atụ ányà na ọ ga-eme

N'ozuzu, a na-enye ịdọ aka ná ntị màkà snow na-ada nke sentimita isii (sentimita iri na isé ) ma ọ bụ karịa n'ime awa irí abụọ, ma ọ bụ sentimita asatọ (irí abụọ ) maọ bụ karịa n"ime awa irí abụọ na anọ.
A kwụsịrị ịdọ aka ná ntị a malite na ógè oké ifufe oyi nkè afọ 2008 na 1909, jiri ịdọ akaebe oké ifufe n'oge oyi dochie ya màkà nnukwu snow.
Na Canada, Environment Canada nyèrè ịdọ áká ná ntị yiri nke ahụ site na Meteorological Service of Canada (MSC).
